settings.title: About Nestasia
settings.subheading:
Nestasia - India's Most Loved Lifestyle And

Home Decor Store

Make Home Special is not only a motto Nestasia follows but also a way to celebrate creativity and individuality. With products that are as functional as they’re beautiful, Nestasia is a home decor brand with a wide range of uniquely designed, quality products to suit all home decor styles ranging from Contemporary, Scandinavian, Bohemian, Minimalist, Eclectic, and more.

Buy Luxury Home Decor Items, Dining &

Kitchen, And Accessories Online

We bring to you an array of ceramicware, glassware, soft furnishings, bath essentials, planters, and faux florals which have been moulded, woven, and designed to perfection by master craftsmen. Be it a sleek mug to carry on the go, gold detailed crockery for festive fine dining, or planters and vases to provide a home for those vibrant florals, Nestasia is the one-stop-shop for making the home a sanctuary of aesthetics and functionality. In our drive to create a space that not only woos your guests but also creates a comforting corner of joy for you too, Nestasia has products that are the result of careful selection, harmoniously blending style and culture.

Explore Premium Categories For Your Home

Dining

Whether it’s double-walled glass cups to help one snuggle up to a warm cuppa with ease, cut-glass textured luxurious tumblers, tea cups, or coffee mugs in solid colours, Nestasia has it all to suit your home. And as they say, something’s missing in a room until you have some floral patterns and omber hues around! Don’t you think so too? With every collection, we believe in bringing to you the best, most trending products that your home deserves so that you can create a home full of joy, a home that’s special.

You can also lay the table spread that suits the ambience and occasion with glass or ceramic plates and bowls. With crockeries featuring dainty daisies to vibrant orchids, detailed golden rims on white plates to subtle gold splatters on luxe emerald plates, geometrically patterned crockeries to solid minimalist tableware, one can find one’s choice to showcase delicacies on.

Most of Nestasia’s dinnerware has been sorted into collections namely, Mandala, Nitori, Ocean, Bloom, Azo, Willow, Aurelea, Ombre, Amusant, Elysian, Toujours, Bohemia, Feliz, Rustic, Cara, Marble, Dune, Mizo, Meraki, Sakura, Kids Fiesta, Daisy, Geometric, Vintage Wonder, for ease of browsing through, as Nestasia aims to cater to products that fulfill every individual’s choice and taste. Keeping in accordance with the collection names, Aurelea features bowls and plates with intricate details, Mandala includes ceramic bowls and plates with symmetrical and balanced florals with components that are vibrant and elevate the table setting. 

The plates and platters are available in varied sizes which are ideal for big gatherings to serve fritters or a small serving for daily snack-time breaks. Bowls for snacks, dips, ramen and noodles, and cereals come in distinctive shapes, sizes and patterns. The style and pattern of crockeries that an individual chooses is a form of self-expression that Nestasia aims to aid one with. To make a concoction of coffee that sets the tastebud alight, Nestasia has a range of manual coffee makers and drippers that will satiate a coffee enthusiast who wants to craft and achieve that perfect brew.

Kitchen

Apart from the stunning kitchenware collection, Nestasia also offers storage essentials like baskets and jars to keep condiments and snack bites fresh and handy by the side while one tunes in to their favourite show, vibes to music or hangs out with friends.

We’ve also got your party and picnic essentials sorted with drink dispensers, wooden, ceramic, and marble platters, and cookware, to be a handy companion. And if you need tips on how to go about laying that perfect party or picnic spread, you can also click on the “Shop the look” section on our home page.

Bath

Bathroom essentials including premium ceramic and glass soap dispensers, storage and laundry baskets, bath accessory sets, and organizers are a guarantee of long-lasting functionality and unsurpassable beauty.

Home Decor

Our decor items include quirky showpieces for the wall and tabletop, handcrafted candles and votives, exquisitely vibrant faux florals, and intricately designed photo frames to treasure happy moments spent with family and friends. 

The wide range of decor objects is a great gifting option whether it's for birthdays, Mother’s Day, Father’s Day, Diwali, weddings, or any other occasion. The decor showpieces also beautify the mantle top or add a pop of colour to the study table. The range of decor objects includes dainty showpieces with trinket dishes (multifunctionality for the win!), dino decor objects that are a trend among children, chef decor objects that add a fun element to the kitchen, and rustic metallic showpieces to give a vintage charm to one’s home.

Gardening is a hobby and a passion, and to nurture that budding gardener, Nestasia has a curated range of planters and pots, to give green babies a home they may get nurtured in. Moulded and crafted by artisans to achieve the perfect finish, the planters come in varying sizes and colours so that one can mix and match them with their interiors. The planters come in colours of green, blue, grey, black, and peach and are available in both solid colours as well as with colourful patterns and scalloped designs, embossed textures that will undoubtedly get one a dollop of praise.

Bags & Accessories

Welcome to Nestasia's world of Bags & Accessories, where style meets functionality! Elevate your every day with our exquisite range, including chic laptop bags for the modern professional, versatile sling bags perfect for urban explorers, and trendy shoulder bags for effortless elegance. Keep lunches fresh on the go with our stylish lunch bags, while our travel pouches ensure organised travels. Explore our collection of sleek makeup pouches for on-the-go touch-ups. Crafted with quality materials and thoughtful design, Nestasia's Bags & Accessories blend practicality with sophistication, enhancing your lifestyle with every carry. Discover your perfect companion today.

Soft Furnishings

Give guests a cheery and warm welcome with bright rugs and runners that elevate the ambience, giving justice to your ‘Home Sweet Home’. To add comfort to an abode, add soft comfortable throws on the sofa, or bask in the warmth of the throw while binge-watching a series. Nestasia offers a varied range of cushions and cushion covers that add oomph to a seating arrangement. The boho handwoven rugs and hand-knotted dhurries in neutral and bright tones feature abstract, geometrical patterns, and add an earthy tone to the homescape that fills the missing piece to one’s interior.

Stationery

Discover the art of organization with Nestasia's Stationery collection. Dive into a world of creativity and functionality with our curated range, featuring DIY paint kits, whimsical keychains, and sleek notebooks. Elevate your planning game with our stylish planners and declutter your workspace with our chic desk organisers. Each item is meticulously crafted to seamlessly blend with your home decor while adding a touch of personality to your daily routine. Whether you're a seasoned planner or a budding artist, Nestasia's Stationery is designed to inspire and organise, ensuring you're always equipped for whatever life throws your way.

Giftings

From everyday essentials to gifts that one can cherish, Nestasia has a plethora of products that are just a click away. A simple addition of a new decor piece to the home, a vibrant bowl on the table, or a colourful faux flower bouquet for a loved one is all it takes to make a difference in one’s home and make it truly special in every way.

  1. Valentine’s Day Gifts

Celebrate love with Nestasia's collection of exquisite Valentine's Day Gifts. Delight your special someone with our thoughtfully curated selection of gift hampers, ranging from elegant home decor pieces to charming accessories. Spark romance with beautiful candle holders, and enchanting photo frames, or indulge in cosy throws for intimate moments. Explore our selection of delicate showpieces, aromatic candles, and decadent chocolates for the perfect expression of affection. Whether you're celebrating a new romance or cherishing years of love, Nestasia offers timeless gifts that capture the essence of Valentine's Day. Show your love in style with our curated collection, designed to make hearts flutter and memories last forever.

  1. Diwali Gifts

Discover an enchanting array of Diwali gifts and festive hampers at Nestasia! Jazz up your celebrations with our curated collection of exquisite home decor accessories, dinnerware, crockery, and more. From elegant dinner sets to intricately designed candles, our offerings embrace the spirit of Diwali. Share the joy with friends and family through thoughtful presents that elevate the festive spirit. Explore our Diwali gift range today and add a touch of elegance to your festivities. Light up your Diwali with Nestasia's extraordinary gifts!

  1. Dhanteras Gifts

Elevate your Dhanteras celebrations with Nestasia's curated collection of exquisite gifts. Discover an array of timeless decor items, kitchen tools, dining essentials, soft furnishings, and more to mark this auspicious occasion. From elegant traditional door hangings to intricately designed festive trays, our offerings embrace the spirit of Dhanteras. Share blessings and prosperity with loved ones through thoughtful presents that reflect your discerning taste. Explore our Dhanteras gift range today and add a touch of elegance to your festivities. Make Dhanteras special with Nestasia's extraordinary gifts.

  1. All-Time Giftings

Explore Nestasia's All-Time Gifting Collection, curated to celebrate life's special moments with elegance and charm. From timeless wedding gifts to heartfelt housewarming gifts, our selection encompasses a diverse array of occasions. Commemorate love with exquisite anniversary gifts and shower blessings on parents-to-be with adorable baby shower tokens. Delight loved ones on their birthdays with unique birthday presents. Each offering is crafted with care, ensuring that every gift radiates warmth and joy. With Nestasia, cherish the beauty of every milestone and make memories that last a lifetime with our exceptional gifting collection.

Why Choose Nestasia?

Choose Nestasia for timeless elegance, unparalleled quality, and thoughtful craftsmanship. Our curated collections blend modern sophistication with classic charm, offering exquisite pieces for every occasion, perfectly blending our motto of quality, utility, and beauty (QUB). With a commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction, Nestasia ensures that every product embodies the essence of luxury living, making each moment memorable.

FAQs

1. What types of products do you offer?

Nestasia boasts an extensive array of products designed to enhance various aspects of your life. From elegantly crafted home decor pieces that infuse charm into your living space to practical kitchenware that elevates your culinary experience, our collection covers a wide spectrum. Additionally, we offer stylish accessories to complement your personal style and curated stationery items to inspire creativity and organisation in your daily routine.

2. Are your products handmade?

While Nestasia takes pride in offering a selection of handmade products, we also curate items sourced from esteemed manufacturers recognized for their exceptional craftsmanship and attention to detail. Our commitment to quality ensures that, whether it's a handmade piece or a curated find, each product in our collection meets our rigorous standards of excellence.

3. Do you offer products for specific occasions?

Indeed, Nestasia understands the importance of commemorating life's significant milestones and special moments. That's why we've curated a range of products specifically tailored for various occasions, including weddings, birthdays, anniversaries, housewarmings, and baby showers. Whether you're celebrating love, welcoming a new home, or honouring a birthday, our thoughtfully curated selection ensures there's something perfect for every occasion.

4. Are your products suitable for gifts?

Absolutely! Nestasia takes pride in offering a plethora of products ideal for gifting. From exquisite home decor pieces that make a lasting impression to stylish accessories that add a touch of elegance to any outfit, our collection is brimming with thoughtful gift ideas. Whether you're searching for a birthday present, anniversary gift, or a token of appreciation, our diverse range ensures you'll find the perfect gift for any recipient.
